text: 20.2-3 Stt 3.1, Dan 6.17, 2 Pi 2.4, Jud 6, Lep 12.9, 16.14-16, 20.8 Dad apɨl, kɨpi awl nɨm yepɨs gep bɨlel tɨkɨl mɨdeb ak nop chɨchɨk dak. Dɨl, binɨb man okok mɨdupsek kɨlop tepayaŋ yepɨs ma gɨnɨmuŋ agɨl, tunɨg dam kaw mɨgan kɨluŋ ma tɨkak anɨb ayaŋ dɨyokɨl, kanɨb gɨñɨl pɨsnep wos gak. Gek nɨm, ne anɨb okok nag sek mɨdek mɨdek, sub anep 1,000 amek, tepayaŋ wɨsɨb yokek owak. Apɨl, sɨkol won olap yokɨp gɨ ajek. Yoy awl nɨm yepɨs agep anɨb ak nɨm, Satan nep.
